pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Guidelines and Regulations for Using Jackpot Lodge Services Jackpot Lodge Home Casino Advantages Perfection Comfort Luxury Terms of Use Privacy Policy Your privacy is paramount to us. Our Privacy Policy, which is integral to these Terms of Use, delineates how we gather, employ, and divulge information about you during your interaction with our website. By utilizing our website, you consent to the collection, usage, and disclosure of your information as outlined in our Privacy Policy. Prohibited conduct includes actions that are harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable. pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Important Information About Jackpot Lodge Policies and Disclosures Jackpot Lodge Home Casino Advantages Perfection Comfort Luxury Disclaimer Reservations and Cancellations All bookings made via the Jackpot Lodge website are contingent on availability and hotel confirmation. Please review your reservation details thoroughly and notify us immediately if there are any errors or discrepancies. Cancellation policies vary depending on the room type, rate, and reservation dates. Refer to the specific cancellation policy provided at the time of booking. To cancel or modify your reservation, contact us promptly to avoid any potential charges. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time at Jackpot Lodge begins at 3:00 PM, and check-out is by 11:00 AM. Requests for early check-in or late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional fees. Hotel Policies Jackpot Lodge is a smoke-free establishment. Smoking is prohibited in all guest rooms and public areas. Pets are not allowed, except for service animals. Violations of these policies may result in additional fees and/or eviction. Payment A valid credit card is required to secure all reservations. Payment for your stay will be processed upon check-in, unless otherwise specified. We accept major credit cards, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover. Taxes and Fees Room rates do not include applicable taxes and fees, such as state and local taxes, resort fees, and service charges. These will be charged separately. Liability for Personal Belongings Jackpot Lodge is not liable for any loss, damage, or theft of personal belongings left in guest rooms or public areas. We recommend securing your valuables at all times and utilizing the in-room safe. Dispute Resolution Any disputes or claims arising from this Disclaimer or your use of the Jackpot Lodge website or services will be resolved through negotiation, mediation, or arbitration. You waive any right to a trial by jury in connection with such disputes or claims. Feedback and Reviews We welcome your feedback and encourage you to share your experiences. By submitting feedback, reviews, or other content to Jackpot Lodge, you grant us a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free, and non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, and display such content in any form, media, or technology. Contact Information For questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding this Disclaimer, our website, or our services, contact us at jackpotlodge@gmail.com. We appreciate your input and will address your inquiries promptly. By using the Jackpot Lodge website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to this Disclaimer. We look forward to welcoming you to Jackpot Lodge, where luck meets luxury! Jackpot Lodge © 2024 Jackpot Lodge. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How Jackpot Lodge Protects and Uses Your Personal Information Jackpot Lodge Home Casino Advantages Perfection Comfort Luxury Privacy Policy Welcome to Jackpot Lodge, your premier casino-hotel destination. We are dedicated to safeguarding your personal information and upholding your privacy rights. If you have any inquiries or concerns regarding our policy or our practices concerning your personal data, please reach out to us at jackpotlodge@gmail.com. When you visit our website and use our services, you entrust us with your personal information, and we take this responsibility very seriously. This privacy policy aims to clearly explain the information we collect, how we use it, and your rights concerning it. We encourage you to read this policy thoroughly, as it is crucial. If you disagree with any terms in this privacy policy, please discontinue the use of our site and services. Information We Collect We automatically gather certain information when you visit, use, or navigate our website. This information does not disclose your specific identity (such as your name or contact details) but may include device and usage data, like your IP address, browser type, device characteristics, operating system, language preferences, referring URLs, device name, country, location, and information about how and when you use our website, along with other technical data. This information is mainly needed to ensure the security and functionality of our website and for our internal analytics and reporting purposes. We use the information we collect or receive: Marketing and Promotional Communications: We and/or our third-party marketing partners may use the personal information you provide for our marketing purposes, aligned with your marketing preferences. You can opt-out of our marketing emails at any time. Administrative Communications: Your personal information may be used to send you updates about products, services, new features, and changes to our terms, conditions, and policies. Posting Testimonials: We post testimonials on our website that may include personal information. Before posting a testimonial, we will obtain your consent to use your name and the content of the testimonial. If you wish to update or delete your testimonial, please contact us at jackpotlodge@gmail.com and include your name, testimonial location, and contact information. Targeted Advertising: Your information may be used to develop and display personalized content and advertising tailored to your interests and/or location. We may work with third parties to deliver and measure the effectiveness of this advertising. Will your information be shared with anyone? In Short: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis: Consent: We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a particular purpose. Legitimate Interests: We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests, provided that such processing is not overridden by your rights and interests. Performance of a Contract: If we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract. Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process. This includes responding to subpoenas or public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements. Vital Interests: We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person, illegal activities, or as evidence in litigation in which we are involved.
